trans-unit.source: Provides a designer canvas, which renders the visual representation of a workflow model as it is being designed.
trans-unit.target: 提供設計工具畫布，這個畫布會呈現設計之工作流程模型的視覺化表示。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext" /> object that is a collection of services shared between all elements contained in the designer and used to interact between the host and the designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext" /> 物件，這個物件是在設計工具所包含之所有項目之間共用的服務集合，會用來在主機與設計工具之間進行互動。

trans-unit.source: Services are published and requested through the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 系統會透過 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext" /> 來發行與要求服務。

trans-unit.source: The editing context for the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程設計工具的編輯內容。

trans-unit.source: Context is not guaranteed to be available during initialization, as the data binding may have not yet resolved.
trans-unit.target: 初始化期間不保證內容可供使用，因為資料繫結可能尚未經過解析。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to ensure that an editing context is available.
trans-unit.target: 有兩個方法可以確保編輯內容可供使用。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner.ModelChanged>, which executes whenever the model is assigned to, or when the value the property points to is updated.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner.ModelChanged>，如此，無論何時指派模型或者屬性指向的值何時更新，它都會執行。

trans-unit.source: Subscribe to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner.Context%2A> dependency property’s availability using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner.Context%2A> 訂閱 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> 相依性屬性的可用性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the context menu for this designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得此設計工具的操作功能表。

trans-unit.source: The context menu for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具的內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Debug.DebuggerService" /> that is used for run-time debugging.
trans-unit.target: 取得用於執行階段偵錯的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Debug.DebuggerService" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Debug.IDesignerDebugView" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Presentation.Debug.IDesignerDebugView" /> 的物件。

trans-unit.source: Saves the current state of the workflow to the <see cref="P:System.WorkflowModel.Design.WorkflowDesigner.Text" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 將工作流程目前的狀態儲存至 <see cref="P:System.WorkflowModel.Design.WorkflowDesigner.Text" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)] is in error state.
trans-unit.target: 指出 [!INCLUDE[wfd1](~/includes/wfd1-md.md)] 是否處於錯誤狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the [!INCLUDE[wfd2](~/includes/wfd2-md.md)] is in error state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 [!INCLUDE[wfd2](~/includes/wfd2-md.md)] 處於錯誤狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Loads a workflow.
trans-unit.target: 載入工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Loads a workflow from the XAML contained in the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner.Text" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner.Text" /> 屬性中包含的 XAML 載入工作流程。

trans-unit.source: The root of the workflow to load.
trans-unit.target: 要載入之工作流程的根。

trans-unit.source: Loads a workflow with the specified instance.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的執行個體，載入工作流程。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the XAML file.
trans-unit.target: XAML 檔案的檔名。

trans-unit.source: Loads a workflow from the XAML contained in the specified file.
trans-unit.target: 從指定檔案中包含的 XAML 載入工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Represents the event handler that goes into effect when something in the workflow model changes.
trans-unit.target: 表示當工作流程模型中的某些內容變更時，會產生效果的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the outline view of the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得工作流程設計工具的大綱模式。

trans-unit.source: The outline view of the workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Workflow Designer 的大綱檢視。

trans-unit.source: Sets the font and color data for the property inspector in a serialized, dictionary format.
trans-unit.target: 以序列化的字典格式設定屬性偵測器的字型與色彩。

trans-unit.source: The font and color data for the property inspector in a serialized, dictionary format.
trans-unit.target: 屬性偵測器的字型與色彩資料，採用序列化的字典格式。

trans-unit.source: The property inspector is commonly known as the property grid.
trans-unit.target: 屬性偵測器通稱為屬性方格。

trans-unit.source: Gets the property inspector, which is commonly known as the property grid.
trans-unit.target: 取得通稱為屬性方格的屬性偵測器。

trans-unit.source: The property inspector.
trans-unit.target: 屬性偵測器。

trans-unit.source: The file name of the XAML file.
trans-unit.target: XAML 檔案的檔名。

trans-unit.source: Saves the workflow to an XAML file.
trans-unit.target: 將工作流程儲存至 XAML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XAML string representation of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定工作流程的 XAML 字串表示。

trans-unit.source: The XAML string representation of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程的 XAML 字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Before getting this value, call <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner.Flush%2A> to convert the current workflow to text.
trans-unit.target: 取得此值前，請先呼叫 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner.Flush%2A>，以將目前的工作流程轉換為文字。

trans-unit.source: After setting this value, call <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner.Load%2A> to load the XAML into the workflow.
trans-unit.target: 設定此值後，請呼叫 <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner.Load%2A>，以將 XAML 載入工作流程。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner.Text" /> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生在 <see cref="P:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowDesigner.Text" /> 屬性值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets a UI element that allows the user to view and edit the workflow visually.
trans-unit.target: 取得允許使用者視覺化檢視並編輯工作流程的 UI 項目。

trans-unit.source: This UI element is commonly referred to as the workflow canvas.
trans-unit.target: 此 UI 項目通常是指工作流程畫布。

trans-unit.source: A UI element that allows the user to view and edit the workflow visually.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用者視覺化檢視並編輯工作流程的 UI 項目。
